attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parents have been helping their children through sixth-form education without EMA for decades. Sixth-form education is still provided for free courtesy of the taxpayer, so I don't see why EMA is necessary on top of that. If parents have managed to support their child until they are 16, why is it suddenly impossible to do so for two more years to ensure they get the best start in life?
